Name: Jerry and the mystery loot box
About the game: Jerry is a novice detective. His first case is connected with the missing child. You have to find out how the lootboxes are involved in all this, and who is behind the kidnapping of the children. Jerry and the mystery loot box - exciting adventure in the genre of point-and-click adventure. The game has its own unique style, like a theatrical production. It seems that the player is playing the real performance. The intense atmosphere of the game and the unique story will not bore anyone. A few puzzles will diversify the gameplay.
